start.1: Now you do not need to independently search for the information you need in telegram chats
start.2: You set the chats and words you want to track in telegram or whatapp
start.3: The application finds the mention of words in chats and sends you an alert with a link to a message in Telegram or WhatsApp
start.4: To use the application, you need to read our privacy policy and terms of use, and give your consent.
start.5: I give my consent to the processing of personal data, as well as consent to:

rates.head: Rates
rates.topP: Don't try to translate this question, it doesn't exist in any language. This senseless phrase only looks like Latin, is it Latin?
rates.topP2: Meanwhile, if you type Lorem ipsum in any Internet search engine, the number of pages where this phrase is found will exceed 80 thousand. This does not happen with nonsense or blunders. So this phrase, although meaningless, is still of great importance.
rates.bottomP: Don't try to translate this question, it doesn't exist in any language. This meaningless phrase only looks like Latin, but is it Latin?
rates.bottomP2: Meanwhile, if you type Lorem ipsum in any Internet search engine, the number of pages where this phrase is found will exceed 80 thousand. This does not happen with nonsense or blunders. So this phrase, although meaningless, is still of great importance.
